home.title: Guardian of LARP Realms
home.subtitle: Free hosting for LARP communities worldwide. Share your adventures, connect with players, and bring your stories to life.

about.title: About Heimdal Portal
about.subtitle: Guardian of the digital bridge between LARP organizers and their communities.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe every LARP deserves a professional online presence. Our mission is to provide free, high-quality hosting solutions that enable LARP organizers to focus on what they do best: creating unforgettable experiences.
mission.vision: From small local gatherings to international events, we support the entire spectrum of Live Action Role Playing communities across the Nordic regions and beyond.

hosting.title: Free Hosting
hosting.description: Professional web hosting with no hidden costs. Custom domains, SSL certificates, and 99.9% uptime guarantee.

customization.title: Custom Design
customization.description: Tailored website designs that capture your LARP's unique atmosphere and aesthetic.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our team of LARP enthusiasts provides technical support and guidance whenever you need it.

team.title: Meet the Guardians
team.description: We're a passionate team of developers, designers, and LARP veterans dedicated to supporting the community that gave us so much joy.

current.title: Current Projects
current.subtitle: Upcoming LARP adventures currently hosted on Heimdal Portal.

chronicles.title: Chronicles of Aethermoor
chronicles.description: An epic high-fantasy campaign set in a world where magic and technology intertwine. Join noble houses, arcane guilds, or forge your own destiny in this immersive political intrigue LARP.

shadowrun.title: Shadowrun: Copenhagen 2080
shadowrun.description: Cyberpunk meets fantasy in this gritty urban adventure through future Copenhagen.

nordic.title: Nordic Sagas
nordic.description: Experience authentic Viking-age adventures based on historical research and Norse mythology.

wasteland.title: Wasteland Warriors
wasteland.description: Post-apocalyptic survival in a world reclaimed by nature and ruled by tribal law.

cta.title: Ready to Host Your LARP?
cta.description: Join the growing community of LARP organizers who trust Heimdal Portal with their digital presence.

previous.title: Previous Projects
previous.subtitle: Legendary adventures that have concluded, leaving behind memories and stories that will last a lifetime.

vampire.title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Copenhagen by Night
vampire.description: Political intrigue and supernatural horror in modern Copenhagen's vampire society.

medieval.title: The Crown of Avalon
medieval.description: Medieval court politics and knightly adventures in the legendary kingdom of Avalon.

cyberpunk.title: Neon Dreams
cyberpunk.description: High-tech, low-life adventures in a dystopian future where corporations rule the world.

steampunk.title: Clockwork Empire
steampunk.description: Victorian-era adventures with steam-powered technology and industrial revolution intrigue.

space.title: Starfall Station
space.description: Space exploration and alien encounters aboard a frontier space station.

postapoc.title: After the Fall
postapoc.description: Survival and rebuilding in a world devastated by nuclear war.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Ready to bring your LARP to the digital realm? Get in touch with our team of passionate developers and LARP enthusiasts.

form.title: Get Your Project Started
form.name: Full Name
form.organization_placeholder: LARP group, organization, or event name
form.message_placeholder: Tell us about your LARP project, timeline, and specific hosting needs...
form.success: Thank you! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

email.title: Email Us
email.description: For hosting requests and general inquiries

hosting.question: Is hosting really free?
hosting.answer: Yes! We provide free hosting with custom domains, SSL certificates, and professional support.

requirements.question: What do you need from us?
requirements.answer: Just basic information about your LARP, desired features, and any specific design preferences.

timeline.question: How long does setup take?
timeline.answer: Most projects are live within 1-2 weeks, depending on complexity and customization needs.

footer.brand_description: Empowering the LARP community with free, professional hosting solutions.
footer.brand_mission: Building bridges between organizers and players across the Nordic realms.
